mapper.insert: insert into l_manual_order(ord_no, category, carrier_no, track_no, owner, status, update_on, create_on, create_by, update_by, from_ken_id, from_city_id, from_town_id, from_where, from_zipcode, to_ken_id, to_city_id, to_town_id, to_where, to_zipcode, on_behalf, amount, china_no, from_contact, to_contact, from_whom, to_whom, channel, china_carrier, collect_num) values (#{orderNo}, #{category}, #{orderNo}, #{trackNo}, #{creator}, #{status}, #{updateOn}, #{createOn}, #{creator}, #{updator}, #{fromKenId}, #{fromCityId}, #{fromTownId}, #{fromDetailAddress}, #{fromZipCode}, #{toKenId}, #{toCityId}, #{toTownId}, #{toDetailAddress}, #{toZipCode}, #{collect}, #{orderNo}, #{chinaNo}, #{fromContact}, #{toContact}, #{fromName}, #{toName}, #{channel}, #{chinaCarrier}, #{collectNum})

insert into l_manual_order_content(ordno, sku, name, num, price,picked,satisfied) values
(#{item.ordno}, #{item.sku}, #{item.name}, #{item.num}, #{item.price},#{item.picked},#{item.satisfied})
mapper.select: select * from l_manual_order ord left join l_manual_order_content content on (ord.ord_no = content.ordno) order by ord.update_on desc

select content.ordno, content.sku, content.name, content.num, content.price, content.picked, content.satisfied from l_manual_order_content content inner join l_manual_order ord on (content.ordno = ord.ord_no) where ordno = #{ordNo} and (ord.status = 2 or ord.status = 7) order by ord.update_on desc
